frame.name: Expected_location_of_person
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Person</fen> usually resides or works in a <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex><m>Is</m> <fex name="Person">Mr. Adams</fex> <t>in</t> <fex name="tim">today</fex>? <fex name="Location">DNI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Location</fen> is the place of business or residence prototypically occupied by the <fen>Person</fen>.
<ex>I couldn't access the details of prospective buyers and sellers and was uncontactable when I was <t>out</t> <fex name="loc">of the office</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Person</fen> is located in or at a place that they customarily occupy.
<ex><fex name="per">The doctor</fex> is not <t>in</t> right now.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time period during which the <fen>Person</fen> occupies the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>Call work, tell them you'll be <t>in</t> <fex name="tim">in the afternoon</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of the time interval during which the <fen>Person</fen> occupies the <fen>Location</fen>.
<ex>It's only nine o'clock, so he won't be <t>in</t> <fex name="dur">for another two hours</fex>.</ex></def-root>
